section.heading: Application to existing relationships.
section.text: Except as otherwise provided in § 19-1513, an interest in or power over property existing on the effective date of this chapter as to which the time for delivering or filing a disclaimer under law superseded by this chapter has not expired may be disclaimed after the effective date of this chapter.

annotations.annotation: Uniform Law: This section is based upon § 16 of the Uniform Disclaimer of Property Interests Act (1999).
